special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Umara enters, if it isn’t a token, create a token that’s a copy of target creature you control.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
When this Expedition reaches stage 2, draw two cards.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Creatures you control can’t be blocked by creatures with greater power.
